Package util.misc

Miscellaneous classes suitable for reuse.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ClosableClassLoader Classloader for jar files that doesn't leave them open infinitely if you read a resource.
DataURL Allows you to create a URL object that refers to a byte array
DB Database utilities
Exceptions Exception-related utilities (static class)
Fonts Obtains information about fonts that is more accurate then the built-in metrics.
HTTPS HTTPS Utilities.
ImageUtils Image-related utility methods.
IO I/O related utility methods
MimeTypes Implement our own mapping of extensions to mime-types.
NameValuePairs Represents named parameters that can be turned into two arrays
NullOKComparator<T extends Comparable<T>> A Comparator that compares instances of class T according to the natural order, except that it does not give errors for null, instead it sorts null first in the order.
PeriodicThread Base class for a thread that does something at regular intervals.
ReverseComparator<T extends Comparable<T>> If T is a Comparable type, then this comparator sorts in the reverse of the natural order for T.
Strings Utilities related to strings and string formatting
UserAgent Provides a method for analysing browser user agent strings.
 

Exception Summary
CausedIOException A class for an IO exception that was caused by another exception.
 

Package util.misc Description

Miscellaneous classes suitable for reuse.
